trips.title: Trips
trips.searchPlaceholder: Search trips by name, location, or date...
trips.departureDescription: Where does your trip start? (e.g., home airport)
trips.searchDeparture: Search for departure airport or location...
trips.travelToFirst: How will you travel to your first destination?
trips.returnSameAsDeparture: Return to same location as departure
trips.searchReturn: Search for return airport or location...
trips.travelFromLast: How will you travel from your last destination?
trips.coverImageHelper: Optional: Add a cover image for your trip card
trips.endAfterStart: End date must be after start date
trips.selectTags: Select tags to categorize your trip
trips.includeDestinationsDesc: Copy all destinations and their basic information
trips.includePoisDesc: Copy all POIs with estimated costs (actual costs reset to zero)
trips.includeAccommodationsDesc: Copy accommodation details (booking references and payment status will be reset)
trips.includeDocumentsDesc: Copy document references (files will be shared between trips)
trips.duplicateNoteStatus: The new trip will always have status set to "Planning"
trips.duplicateNoteDates: All dates will be automatically adjusted based on the new start date
trips.duplicateNotePoi: POI engagement metrics (likes/vetoes) will be reset
trips.undoWindow: You will have 5 seconds to undo the deletion after confirming.
trips.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this trip? All associated destinations and their data will be permanently removed.

map.title: Map Settings
map.refreshNote: After saving your Mapbox token, you may need to refresh the page for maps to load with the new token.

routing.title: Routing Settings
routing.description: Configure which routing service to use for calculating routes between destinations.
routing.defaultOrsDesc: Use OpenRouteService for all routing. Train/bus routes use road geometry as approximation.
routing.googlePublicTransport: Google Maps for Public Transport Only
routing.googlePublicTransportDesc: Use Google Maps Routes API for train/bus routes (shows actual rail/bus geometry). Other modes use OpenRouteService.
routing.googleEverythingDesc: Use Google Maps Routes API for all transport modes (car, train, bus, walk, bike).
routing.enableRoutesApi: Enable the "Routes API" for your project.
routing.googleBillingNote: Google Maps Routes API requires billing to be enabled but includes a free tier. If no API key is configured, the system falls back to OpenRouteService.
routing.googleNoKeyWarning: You have selected a Google Maps routing option but haven't provided an API key. Routes will fall back to OpenRouteService.
routing.navitimeJapanDesc: Use NAVITIME for train/bus routes in Japan (JR, Shinkansen, local lines). 500 free requests/month via RapidAPI. Non-Japan routes fall back to other services.

geocoding.title: Geocoding Settings
geocoding.description: Configure which service to use for location search (autocomplete). This affects how fast search results appear.
geocoding.mapboxDesc: Fast, reliable. Latency: ~50-150ms per search. Uses your Mapbox token from Map Settings.
geocoding.noTokenWarning: You have selected Mapbox Geocoding but haven't configured a Mapbox token in Map Settings. Searches will fall back to Nominatim.
geocoding.cacheNote: Results are cached locally for 24 hours to improve performance. Repeated searches for the same location will be instant regardless of provider.

dateFormat.title: Date Format Settings
dateFormat.description: Choose how dates are displayed throughout the application. "Auto" uses your browser's language settings.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.

theme.title: Theme Settings
theme.description: Choose your preferred appearance. System will follow your device settings.

exportImport.title: Export & Import
exportImport.exportDescription: Download a backup of your settings and preferences.
exportImport.importDescription: Restore settings from a previously exported backup file.
exportImport.importWarning: Importing will overwrite your current settings. Make sure to export a backup first if needed.

accommodation.title: Accommodations
accommodation.checkInBeforeArrival: Check-in cannot be before destination arrival
accommodation.checkOutAfterDeparture: Check-out cannot be after destination departure

documents.noDocumentsHint: No documents yet. Upload flight tickets, hotel reservations, or travel insurance.
documents.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are allowed.
documents.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
documents.noDocumentsUploadHint: No documents yet. Click + to upload tickets, confirmations, or receipts.

journal.title: Journal
journal.addTag: Add a tag and press Enter
journal.deleteConfirm: Delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

map.title: Map
map.configureToken: Please configure your Mapbox access token in Settings to view the map.
map.clickToAddWaypoint: Click on the map to add a waypoint
map.clickToAddDestination: Click on the map to add a destination

routes.title: Routes
routes.addAtLeast2Destinations: Add at least 2 destinations to see route details
routes.addTwoDestinations: Add at least 2 destinations to see route details

ai.tellMeWhere: Tell me where you'd like to go, and I'll help you plan the perfect adventure.
ai.helpDiscover: I can help you discover places, create schedules, and manage your itinerary.
ai.whereToGo: Where would you like to go?
ai.chooseTrip: Choose a trip to discuss or start planning a new one
ai.startByPlanning: Start by planning a new trip above

settings.title: AI Assistant Settings
settings.description: Configure the AI travel assistant that helps you plan trips, find attractions, and optimize schedules.
settings.showChatButton: Show the AI chat button throughout the app
settings.apiKeysManagedPerTrip: API keys are now managed per-trip
settings.apiKeysManagedDescription: AI provider keys (Anthropic, OpenAI, Google AI) and service keys (Mapbox, OpenRouteService) are stored securely at the trip level and shared among trip members. Go to your trip settings to add or manage API keys.
settings.apiKeysDescription: Configure API keys for each AI provider. Keys are stored securely on the orchestrator server.
settings.orchestratorDescription: The URL of the Travel Bridge Orchestrator service.
settings.defaultModelHint: Select the model that will be used by default when you open the AI chat.
settings.noModelsNote: Could not connect to orchestrator to fetch models. Make sure the service is running at {{url}}
settings.noModelsAvailable: No AI models available. Configure at least one provider (Claude, Gemini, or Ollama).
settings.addKeysHint: Add API keys above to enable each provider. Models will appear in the selector once configured.
settings.enableDescription: Show the AI chat button throughout the app
settings.orchestratorUrlDescription: The URL of the Travel Bridge Orchestrator service.
settings.connectionError: Could not connect to orchestrator. Make sure the service is running at {{url}}
settings.noModels: No AI models available. Configure at least one provider (Claude, Gemini, or Ollama).
settings.providerClaude: Claude Opus 4.6 — Most powerful model for travel planning
settings.providerGemini: Gemini 3 Flash (Vertex AI) — Frontier intelligence at lightning speed
settings.providerOllama: Local models — Private, no API key needed
settings.providerPerplexity: Powers intelligent POI search with web-sourced travel recommendations
settings.addApiKeysHint: Add your API keys above to enable each provider. You only need one active provider to use the AI assistant.

agent.title: Agent Customization
agent.description: Customize the AI assistant's name, personality, and available tools for your travel planning experience.
agent.customizationDescription: Customize the AI assistant's name, personality, and available tools for your travel planning experience.
agent.nameHint: Give your assistant a custom name that appears in the chat
agent.agentNameDescription: Give your assistant a custom name that appears in the chat
agent.instructionsPlaceholder: Add custom instructions for the AI assistant... (e.g., 'Focus on budget-friendly options' or 'I prefer walking tours')
agent.instructionsHint: These instructions guide the AI's responses and recommendations
agent.instructionsDescription: These instructions guide the AI's responses and recommendations
agent.settingsNote: Changes take effect in new chat sessions. Existing conversations will continue with their original settings.
agent.appToolsInfo: These tools allow the AI to interact with your travel data and planning features.
agent.externalToolsInfo: These tools fetch real-time information from external services.
agent.changesNote: Changes take effect in new chat sessions. Existing conversations will continue with their original settings.

toolDescriptions.searchDestinations: Geocode and validate locations for your trip
toolDescriptions.destinationManagement: Add, update, and remove destinations within trips
toolDescriptions.poiSuggestions: Discover attractions, restaurants, and activities nearby
toolDescriptions.poiManagement: Create, update, schedule, and manage points of interest
toolDescriptions.routeCalculator: Calculate routes and directions between two points
toolDescriptions.travelMatrix: Get travel times and distances between multiple points
toolDescriptions.tripManagement: Create, update, and manage your trips
toolDescriptions.budgetCalculator: Estimate costs and track trip expenses
toolDescriptions.perplexitySearch: AI-powered search for curated POI recommendations from the web
toolDescriptions.webSearch: Search the web for travel information

hotels.title: Hotel Search
hotels.clickSearchHotels: Click "Search Hotels" to find hotels near your destination.
hotels.noCoordinates: This destination has no coordinates. Please set a location first.

segments.searchPlaceholder: Search for a city, landmark, station...
segments.travelModeToStop: Travel mode to reach this stop
segments.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this stop?

destinations.title: Destination
destinations.dateCollisionWarning: Date overlap detected with existing destinations

poi.title: Points of Interest
poi.findingBestPlaces: Finding the best places for you
poi.rescheduleAll: Re-schedule all POIs, not just unscheduled ones
poi.noDestinationsAddFirst: No destinations yet. Add a destination first to attach POIs.

itinerary.title: Daily Itinerary
itinerary.dragPlacesHere: Drag places here to add them to this day
itinerary.needAtLeast2POIs: Need at least 2 POIs to optimize
itinerary.alreadyOptimal: The current order is already optimal!

scheduler.transitEstimateNote: Transit uses driving times x1.5 as estimate
scheduler.includeScheduledDesc: Re-schedule all POIs, not just unscheduled ones
scheduler.fallbackNotice: Using estimated travel times (ORS API unavailable).
scheduler.daysWithoutAccommodation: {{count}} day has no accommodation set. Routes will start from city center.
scheduler.daysWithoutAccommodation_other: {{count}} days have no accommodation set. Routes will start from city center.
scheduler.addPOIsFirst: Add some POIs first, or toggle to include scheduled ones

auth.loginSubtitle: Sign in to plan your trips

collaboration.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} from this trip?

globalTripView.title: My Trips
globalTripView.emptyDescription: Every great journey begins with a single step. Create your first trip and start exploring the world!
globalTripView.noMatchingSearch: We couldn't find any trips matching "{{query}}". Try different keywords or clear your filters.
globalTripView.allCompleted: All your trips are completed or in the past. Show completed trips to see them.
globalTripView.noFilterResults: No trips match your current filters. Adjust your selection or clear filters to see all trips.

errors.unexpectedError: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
